org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class SelectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.SelectionHandler

  • final class SelectionHandler
extends Object
    Manages the selection on canvas, drawing selection area and implementing mouse listeners for canvas.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void addListeners()
      Adds events listener to canvas element of chart.
      private void adjustPointsXByRender(SelectionCleaner selectionCleaner, double x)
      Adjusts X coordinates and items for selection cleaner element by rendering, using x value calculated previously.
      private void applyAreaBorder(Context2dItem ctx)
      Apply the border to selection area if required.
      private void applySnapshot(Context2dItem ctx, boolean refresh)
      The snapshot is the image of chart (without any selection).
      Every time the selection is updating, it removes the previous selection putting the original chart (image snapshot) and then draws new selection.
      private void calculatePointsX(SelectionCleaner selectionCleaner)
      Calculates X coordinates and items for selection cleaner element by alignment and rendering
      private void calculatePointsY(SelectionCleaner selectionCleaner)
      Calculates Y coordinates and items for selection cleaner element by position.
      private void calculateSelectionCleanerHeight()
      Calculates the height of selection cleaner element and sets all values for label and image as well.
      Height is composed by:
      border width padding image height or font size padding border width
      (package private) void calculateSelectionCleanerPositions()
      Calculates X and Y coordinates for selection cleaner element and for image and label
      private void calculateSelectionCleanerWidth()
      Calculates the width of selection cleaner element and sets all values for label and image as well.
      Width is composed by:
      border width padding image width or label width or image width plus label width with spacing padding border width
      (package private) void destroy()
      Cleans up an handler which is going to be removed.
      private void drawSelectionCleaner()
      Draws the selection cleaner element in the canvas of chart

      Complete an existing selection on canvas by an event.
      Can be invokes by mouse up or refresh of chart (like resizing).

      Complete an existing selection on canvas by an event.

      • startSelection

        void startSelection(double x)
        Start selection on canvas by the starting X coordinate.
        Can be invokes by mouse down or refresh of chart (like resizing).
        Parameters:
        x - the starting X coordinate.

      • updateSelection

        void updateSelection(double x,
                     boolean refresh)
        Update an existing selection on canvas by new X coordinate.
        Can be invokes by mouse move or refresh of chart (like resizing).
        Parameters:
        x - new X coordinate.
        refresh - if true the chart is refreshing therefore it doesn't clear the canvas

      • applyAreaBorder

        private void applyAreaBorder(Context2dItem ctx)
        Apply the border to selection area if required.
        Parameters:
        ctx - rendering interface used to draw on a canvas

      • applySnapshot

        private void applySnapshot(Context2dItem ctx,
                           boolean refresh)
        The snapshot is the image of chart (without any selection).
        Every time the selection is updating, it removes the previous selection putting the original chart (image snapshot) and then draws new selection.
        Parameters:
        ctx - rendering interface used to draw on a canvas
        refresh - if is called during a refresh

      • endSelection

        void endSelection(BaseNativeEvent event)
        Complete an existing selection on canvas by an event.
        Can be invokes by mouse up or refresh of chart (like resizing).
        Parameters:
        event - event which will complete the selection

      • endSelection

        void endSelection(BaseNativeEvent event,
                  boolean skipNextFireEvent)
        Complete an existing selection on canvas by an event.
        Can be invokes by mouse up or refresh of chart (like resizing).
        Parameters:
        event - event which will complete the selection
        skipNextFireEvent - if true, does not send any event

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Recalculates the selection area and track and draws the area when a chart is updated or resized.

      • isChartChanged

        boolean isChartChanged(String dataUrl)
        Checks if the chart is changed.
        It checks:
        • the dimension of chart
        • data image of chart
        Parameters:
        dataUrl - data image for chart
        Returns:
        true if chart is changed, otherwise false.

      • calculateSelectionCleanerHeight

        private void calculateSelectionCleanerHeight()
        Calculates the height of selection cleaner element and sets all values for label and image as well.
        Height is composed by:
        • border width
        • padding
        • image height or font size
        • padding
        • border width

      • calculateSelectionCleanerWidth

        private void calculateSelectionCleanerWidth()
        Calculates the width of selection cleaner element and sets all values for label and image as well.
        Width is composed by:
        • border width
        • padding
        • image width or label width or image width plus label width with spacing
        • padding
        • border width

      • calculateSelectionCleanerPositions

        void calculateSelectionCleanerPositions()
        Calculates X and Y coordinates for selection cleaner element and for image and label

        Parameters:

      • adjustPointsXByRender

        private void adjustPointsXByRender(SelectionCleaner selectionCleaner,
                                   double x)
        Adjusts X coordinates and items for selection cleaner element by rendering, using x value calculated previously.
        Parameters:
        selectionCleaner - selection cleaner instance
        x - value calculated applying the alignment

      • calculatePointsY

        private void calculatePointsY(SelectionCleaner selectionCleaner)
        Calculates Y coordinates and items for selection cleaner element by position.
        Parameters:
        selectionCleaner - selection cleaner instance

        private boolean isEventInSelectionCleaner(BaseNativeEvent event)
        Checks if the coordinate of event is inside the selection cleaner element.
        Parameters:
        event - event to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if inside the element, otherwise false.

        private boolean isEventInChartArea(BaseNativeEvent event)
        Checks if the coordinate of event is inside the chart area.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if inside the area, otherwise false.
